processAutomation.title: Business Process Automation
processAutomation.description: Optimize operations, reduce costs, and eliminate errors with our intelligent automation solutions.
processAutomation.subtitle: Transform your business with the power of intelligent automation

caseStudy.title: Success Story: Transformation in the Manufacturing Sector

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.description: A leading manufacturing company faced significant delays in their supply chain, with over 20 hours weekly spent on manual order management and a 15% error rate in data entry causing costly delays.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We implemented an intelligent automation solution that fully digitized order processing, integrating ERP, inventory management, and logistics systems with intelligent document recognition.

results.title: Results Achieved
results.description: 85% reduction in processing time, near-total elimination of manual errors, and a 23% increase in order fulfillment capacity, with complete ROI achieved in less than 6 months.

transformation.title: Process Transformation
transformation.paragraph1: In today's business environment, intelligent automation is key to staying competitive. Our solutions transform your core operations to improve efficiency and reduce costs.
transformation.paragraph2: By using advanced technologies such as AI, machine learning, and robotic process automation, we digitize and optimize your workflows to eliminate bottlenecks and maximize productivity.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We implement automation solutions following a proven methodology that guarantees quick and sustainable results.
steps: Detailed analysis of current processes and improvement opportunities
Custom solution design based on your specific objectives
Progressive implementation with measurable results at each phase
approach.conclusion: This structured approach ensures successful adoption and maximum return on investment for your automation initiatives.

items.title: Operational Cost Reduction
items.description: Save up to 40% in costs by automating repetitive tasks and manual processes

items.title: Greater Precision
items.description: Eliminate human errors and ensure consistency across all your business processes

items.title: Increased Productivity
items.description: Free up your team's potential by allowing them to focus on higher-value tasks

items.title: Improved Scalability
items.description: Adapt your operations to demand peaks without proportionally increasing costs

items.title: Robotic Process Automation (RPA)
items.description: Bots that replicate human actions to automate repetitive tasks across multiple systems

items.title: Intelligent Document Processing
items.description: Automatic data extraction from unstructured documents with over 95% accuracy

items.title: Intelligent Workflows
items.description: End-to-end process orchestration with AI-based decision making

items.title: Seamless Integration
items.description: Connectivity with your existing systems without the need for significant changes to your infrastructure

dataDriven.title: Data-driven decisions

dataDriven.paragraph2: We design solutions that integrate diverse data sources, normalize information, and provide advanced analytics so you can make faster and more accurate decisions.

invoiceManagement.title: Automated Invoice Management
invoiceManagement.description: Optimize your entire invoicing cycle with our intelligent invoice processing and management solution.
invoiceManagement.subtitle: Digitize and automate your entire invoicing process from end to end
invoiceManagement.mainDescription: Our invoice management platform leverages artificial intelligence and natural language processing to transform your financial operations, reducing cycle times and minimizing errors.

challenges.title: Challenges of traditional invoice management
challenges.paragraph1: Manual invoice management consumes valuable time, is error-prone, and delays payment cycles, affecting your cash flow and business relationships.
challenges.paragraph2: Many businesses face issues with document loss, data discrepancies, and lack of real-time visibility, making financial decision-making difficult.

solution.title: Our comprehensive solution
solution.description: Our automated invoice management platform solves these problems through advanced AI technology and natural language processing, ensuring accuracy, speed, and complete control over your invoicing process.

items.title: Intelligent Data Capture
items.description: Automatic extraction of key information from invoices in any format

items.title: Validation and Verification
items.description: Automatic checking against purchase orders and contracts

items.title: Configurable Approval Flows
items.description: Custom approval routes according to your business policies

items.title: ERP Integration
items.description: Seamless connection with SAP, Oracle, Microsoft Dynamics and other financial systems

items.title: Time Savings
items.description: 80% reduction in time spent on manual processing

items.title: Fewer Errors
items.description: 95% decrease in registration and processing errors

items.title: Cash Flow Improvement
items.description: Optimization of payment schedules and leveraging early payment discounts

items.title: Compliance
items.description: Guaranteed adherence to local and international tax and accounting regulations

steps.title: Reception and intake
steps.description: Automatic capture of invoices via email, web portal or scanning

steps.title: Extraction and validation
steps.description: Intelligent data recognition and validation against ERP systems

steps.title: Approval workflow
steps.description: Automatic routing to the corresponding approvers

steps.title: Accounting and payment
steps.description: Automatic recording in the general ledger and payment scheduling

cta.title: Optimize your invoice management
cta.description: Request a personalized demonstration of our automated invoice management solution

testimonial.quote: Automating our invoice process reduced processing time from 15 days to just 2, improved our cash flow, and virtually eliminated all manual errors.
testimonial.author: Manuel García

aboutUsPage.title: About Us
aboutUsPage.description: We are experts in intelligent automation and digital transformation, committed to the success and growth of our clients.

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Glipce was born in 2020 with a clear mission: to help companies unlock their potential through intelligent automation. Founded by a team of experts in artificial intelligence and business processes, we identified an opportunity to transform the way companies approach repetitive tasks.
history.paragraph2: Since then, we have grown to become a reference in the industry, helping hundreds of companies optimize their operations, reduce costs, and improve customer and employee satisfaction.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Our mission is to unleash the human potential in companies by automating repetitive tasks so people can focus on creative and strategic activities that truly add value.
mission.paragraph2: We believe that technology should serve people, not the other way around. That's why we develop solutions focused on improving the work experience, increasing productivity, and enhancing innovation.

aboutUsPage.quote: Don't waste time on repetitive tasks. Focus on what really matters to grow your business while we optimize your processes.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We constantly seek new ways to apply technology to solve complex business problems.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We commit to the highest standards of quality in everything we do, from development to support.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: We work closely with our clients, understanding their needs and co-creating solutions tailored to their reality.

items.title: Impact
items.description: We measure our success by the tangible value we generate for our clients and society.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
items: AI and automation experts with years of experience
Customized solutions adapted to your business reality
Focus on measurable results and demonstrable ROI
Business model that only makes us win when you win

testimonials.title: Real Results
testimonials.subtitle: Companies that multiplied their ROI with our solutions

items.text: We implemented invoice automation and reduced costs by exactly 78%. In just 3 months we recovered our entire investment and now save €45,000 monthly.
items.name: Carlos Méndez

items.text: Our customer service went from responding in 24 hours to just 2 minutes. Satisfaction increased from 67% to 94% and sales grew 35% in the first quarter.
items.name: Laura Gómez

items.text: With their predictive analytics, we reduced stock by 42% while maintaining the same availability. Annual savings of €480,000 and 27% improvement in inventory turnover.
items.name: Javier Ortega

items.text: We automated 87% of administrative processes. Result: 52% reduction in operational costs and 45% increase in productivity. 375% ROI in 6 months.
items.name: Patricia Sánchez

items.text: We optimized routes with their AI and reduced logistics costs by exactly 38.7%. Deliveries 43% faster and 29% reduction in CO2 emissions.
items.name: Rodrigo Torres

items.text: We freed up 1,200 monthly hours in HR thanks to their automation. 93% reduction in errors and annual savings of €156,000 in this department alone.
items.name: Sofía Morales

items.text: Incident resolution went from 48h to just 14 minutes. Customer satisfaction increased from 54% to 91% and we reduced staff turnover by 67%.
items.name: Miguel Ángel López

items.text: They integrated their AI with our 14 legacy systems without issues. Implementation time: 3 weeks (vs 9 months estimated by other providers).
items.name: Elena García

items.text: 877% ROI in the first year. Documented savings of €1.2M in operational costs and revenue increase of €840,000 due to greater commercial efficiency.
items.name: Daniel Martínez

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.description: Discover how we've helped companies across various industries transform their operations, reduce costs, and accelerate growth through intelligent automation.

challenges.fintechChallenge: Manual processing of over 5,000 monthly applications with high error rates and long waiting times.
challenges.logisticsChallenge: Inefficient delivery route management with high fuel consumption and frequent delays.
challenges.retailChallenge: Overwhelmed customer service system with 45-minute wait times and low satisfaction.
challenges.healthcareChallenge: Manual management of medical invoices with frequent errors and delays in payments to providers.
challenges.educationChallenge: Complex administrative processes that reduced time for educational attention and content development.
challenges.manufacturingChallenge: Manual and inefficient quality control with a high rate of defective products reaching customers.

solutions.fintechSolution: Automation system with OCR and AI to digitize and process applications automatically.
solutions.logisticsSolution: Implementation of route optimization system with predictive AI for traffic and operating conditions.
solutions.retailSolution: AI virtual assistants to resolve frequent inquiries and intelligent prioritization system.
solutions.healthcareSolution: Automated invoice processing system with intelligent validation and digital approval.
solutions.educationSolution: Comprehensive automation platform for enrollment, evaluation, and communication with students.
solutions.manufacturingSolution: Computer vision system with AI for automatic detection of defects in real time.

resultsList.fintechResults: Reduction of processing time from 3 days to 4 hours, error rate below 1%, annual savings of €500,000.
resultsList.logisticsResults: 23% reduction in fuel costs, 31% fewer delays, and 28% increase in daily delivery capacity.
resultsList.retailResults: Automatic resolution of 78% of inquiries, reduction of wait times to 5 minutes, and 67% increase in satisfaction.
resultsList.healthcareResults: 98% reduction in billing errors, decrease in payment cycle from 45 to 7 days, and 35% savings in administrative costs.
resultsList.educationResults: 75% reduction in administrative workload, 40% increase in time dedicated to students, and improved academic results.
resultsList.manufacturingResults: 94% reduction in defective products delivered, 28% increase in production efficiency, and return on investment in 6 months.

longQuotes.quote: The automation of our financial processes completely transformed our operation. Now we can dedicate more resources to innovation and less to repetitive tasks.
longQuotes.author: María Rodríguez

longQuotes.quote: The return on investment exceeded all our expectations. We not only saved costs, but also significantly improved our customers' experience.
longQuotes.author: Carlos Martínez

longQuotes.quote: The implementation was quick and with minimal disruption. The Glipce team accompanied us at every step of the process, ensuring immediate results.
longQuotes.author: Ana Gómez

features.resourcesDescription: Access exclusive content, tools and resources designed to help you better understand the automation and digital transformation of your company.

description.timeSaving: Reduction in time spent on billing tasks
description.lessErrors: Reduction in billing errors and discrepancies
description.compliance: Guarantee of compliance with tax regulations
description.qualityImprovement: Reduction of errors and rework by up to 70%
description.satisfactionIncrease: Increase in customer and employee satisfaction

items.question: How long does implementation actually take?
items.answer: Most of our solutions are operational in just 2-4 weeks. For more complex processes, the maximum timeframe is 12 weeks, but you'll start seeing partial results from week 2 onwards.

items.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use the solutions?
items.answer: No. Our solutions are designed to be used by non-technical staff. We provide comprehensive training and an intuitive interface that allows anyone to harness the power of AI without specialized knowledge.

items.question: What ROI can I expect and in what timeframe?
items.answer: Our clients achieve an average ROI of 5x in the first year. 83% recover their investment in less than 6 months, and in cases of invoice automation and customer service, the return can be as quick as 8 weeks.

items.question: Will you integrate with the systems we already have?
items.answer: Absolutely. We integrate with over 250 different business systems. Our technology is designed to work with your current infrastructure, without requiring costly migrations or replacements.

items.question: What if it doesn't work for our business?
items.answer: We offer a satisfaction guarantee. If in the first 90 days you don't experience the agreed results, we'll refund 100% of your investment. In 7 years, we've only had to make 3 refunds among more than 500 implementations.

items.question: How does your price compare to doing this work internally?
items.answer: Developing similar capabilities internally would cost 3-5 times more and take 12-18 months. Our solution offers proven technology, ready to use, without the development risks and with a predictable cost.
